title: Children room 01
description: This package includes high quality models for your Children room. Render-ready devices for animation and VR
longDescription:
Preface:

  • Visit my website: PhiArchviz
  • This model is optimized for Unreal Engine 5
  • PBR material for Lumen. Be sure to turn on Virtual Textures for both the Opacity Mask to display the fire material and the translucent curtain material.
  • Compatible with Path-Tracing with some minor material changes
  • This version only includes Animation. 
  • Subsequent versions will include both Blue-print and interactive


Features:

  • Quad-based mesh with attention to detail such as welds, stitching, and wrinkles.
  • PBR materials created in Substance Painter, compatible with all major 3D software.
  • Ready for close-up renders or animation with no further editing required.
  • The coordinate axis is located below and at the base of the object

Benefits:

  • We provide ready-to-use files for your preferred 3D software (3ds Max, Cinema4D, SketchUp, Unreal Engine, Blender, etc.).
  • If you are using any 3D application such as: Cinema4D, Sketchup, Unreal Engine, Blender... you just need to contact us and receive the corresponding file.
  • Dedicated customer support with a satisfaction guarantee.
  • Loyalty program with discounts for repeat customers.


Scene details:

-Unit: mm / Texture size: From 2k to 4k

The scene includes the following high-quality assets:

  • 14 bathroom properties
  • 10 bathroom decorations
  • 1 amplified LED light


File format:

  • Unreal Engine 5.2 - Lumen (Compatible with Path-Tracing)
  • Unreal Engine 5.3 - Lumen (Compatible with Path-Tracing)
  • Other files (FBX - OBJ - 3DS - DAE)
  • Post Production (Contains image files after post-production)

Other formats (Please text me to receive files):

  • 3dsmax * Standard*Vray*Corona 
  • Blender 3.0 * Cycles - Eevee
  • Cinema 4D - R21 * Corona
  • Cinema 4D - R21 * Standard
  • Sketchup * Standard

Custom 3D Archviz models:

We also create custom Archviz 3D models to your exact specifications. If you need any 3D models for Archviz, please message me via Gmail to discuss specific work.


Best regards !
technicalDetails:
Collision: Yes, mix of custom and automatic

Vertex Count: 392398 tris

LODs: No

Number of Unique Meshes: 56

Number of Materials and Material Instances: 20

Number of Textures: 40

Texture Resolutions: 2048x2048 - 4096x4096


Windows: Yes

Documentation: Lumen Global Illumination and Reflections | Epic Developer Community (epicgames.com)

Important/Additional Notes: The current version is optimized for Lumen and UE 5.2, UE 5.3, UE 5.4
